segments.text: I notice the sink faucet still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge in a steady flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is turned away, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming fast on the linoleum floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Didn't expect him to go that high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are spreading out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a quiet garden path lined with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back to let in the daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron tied neatly around her waist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of clean dishes wait on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's aware of the overflow yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unexpectedly precarious here.
segments.speaker: PAR
